(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBP know)
      (SBAR (IN that)
        (S
          (NP
            (NP (DT a) (NN lot))
            (PP (IN of)
              (NP (NNP Singaporeans))))
          (VP (VBP avoid)
            (S
              (VP (VBG going)
                (PP (TO to)
                  (NP (NNP Newton) (NNP Food) (NNP Centre)))
                (SBAR (IN as)
                  (S
                    (NP (PRP it))
                    (VP (VBZ is)
                      (ADVP (RB often))
                      (VP (VBN seen)
                        (PP (IN as)
                          (NP (DT a) (NN tourist) (NN trap)))))))))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(know-2, I-1)
root(ROOT-0, know-2)
mark(avoid-8, that-3)
det(lot-5, a-4)
nsubj(avoid-8, lot-5)
prep(lot-5, of-6)
pobj(of-6, Singaporeans-7)
ccomp(know-2, avoid-8)
xcomp(avoid-8, going-9)
prep(going-9, to-10)
nn(Centre-13, Newton-11)
nn(Centre-13, Food-12)
pobj(to-10, Centre-13)
mark(seen-18, as-14)
nsubjpass(seen-18, it-15)
auxpass(seen-18, is-16)
advmod(seen-18, often-17)
advcl(going-9, seen-18)
prep(seen-18, as-19)
det(trap-22, a-20)
nn(trap-22, tourist-21)
pobj(as-19, trap-22)


(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (PP (IN Furthermore))
    (, ,)))


root(ROOT-0, Furthermore-1)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (JJ many) (NNS foodies))
    (ADVP (RB also))
    (VP (VBD lament)
      (NP (DT the) (NN fact))
      (SBAR
        (SBAR (IN that)
          (S
            (NP (DT the) (NN food))
            (ADVP (RB there))
            (VP (VBZ is) (RB not)
              (ADJP (JJ outstanding)))))
        (CC and)
        (SBAR (IN that)
          (S
            (NP (EX there))
            (VP (VBP are)
              (VP (VBG nicer)
                (NP (NN hawker) (NN food))
                (ADVP (RB elsewhere))
                (PP (IN at)
                  (NP (JJR lower) (NNS prices)))))))))
    (. .)))


amod(foodies-2, many-1)
nsubj(lament-4, foodies-2)
advmod(lament-4, also-3)
root(ROOT-0, lament-4)
det(fact-6, the-5)
dobj(lament-4, fact-6)
mark(outstanding-13, that-7)
det(food-9, the-8)
nsubj(outstanding-13, food-9)
advmod(outstanding-13, there-10)
cop(outstanding-13, is-11)
neg(outstanding-13, not-12)
ccomp(lament-4, outstanding-13)
cc(outstanding-13, and-14)
mark(nicer-18, that-15)
expl(nicer-18, there-16)
aux(nicer-18, are-17)
conj(outstanding-13, nicer-18)
nn(food-20, hawker-19)
dobj(nicer-18, food-20)
advmod(nicer-18, elsewhere-21)
prep(nicer-18, at-22)
amod(prices-24, lower-23)
pobj(at-22, prices-24)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (DT That))
    (VP (VBZ 's)
      (VP (VBZ is)
        (NP
          (NP (DT a) (NN bit))
          (PP (IN of)
            (NP
              (NP (DT a) (NN shame))
              (SBAR (IN because)
                (S
                  (NP (PRP I))
                  (VP (VBP think)
                    (SBAR (IN that)
                      (S
                        (NP (DT this))
                        (VP (VBZ is)
                          (NP (DT the)
                            (ADJP (RBS most) (RB well) (VBN known))
                            (NN hawker) (NN center)))))))))))
        (PP (IN amongst)
          (NP (PRP$ our) (NNS tourists)))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(bit-5, That-1)
aux(bit-5, 's-2)
cop(bit-5, is-3)
det(bit-5, a-4)
root(ROOT-0, bit-5)
prep(bit-5, of-6)
det(shame-8, a-7)
pobj(of-6, shame-8)
mark(think-11, because-9)
nsubj(think-11, I-10)
dep(shame-8, think-11)
mark(center-20, that-12)
nsubj(center-20, this-13)
cop(center-20, is-14)
det(center-20, the-15)
advmod(known-18, most-16)
advmod(known-18, well-17)
amod(center-20, known-18)
nn(center-20, hawker-19)
ccomp(think-11, center-20)
prep(bit-5, amongst-21)
poss(tourists-23, our-22)
pobj(amongst-21, tourists-23)
